createConfigurationFilter

public static org.osgi.framework.Filter createConfigurationFilter(String pid,
                                                                  String factoryPid,
                                                                  String location)
Create ConfigurationEvent specific AND-filter

Parameters:
pid - configuration PID (optional)
factoryPid - configuration FactoryPID (optional)
location - bundle location (optional)
Returns:
filter
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - If pid or factoryPid or location are invalid to create filter
NullPointerException - If pid, factoryPid and location are null
Since:
1.0

factoryPid - FactoryPID
properties - configuration properties
delay - time interval to wait before supply action. If zero, the method will not wait.
timeUnit - time unit for the time interval
Returns:
configuration object
Throws:
NullPointerException - If configurationAdmin is null
Since:
1.0
